website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a large hoop shape, vibrant colors, a strong strawberry scent, and matching flavor, these chunky treats will excite a variety of small animals, and you’ll feel good knowing that they’re eating additional vitamins, minerals, and DHA fatty acids.
pros: Corn flour, wheat, oats, and soybean meal are the first 4 ingredients
Enjoyed by rabbits, guinea pigs, hamsters, chinchillas, mice, and rats
Crunchy texture promotes chewing and dental health

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Bunny Treat. Not too good during shipping!
customer_reviews.text: 🐇 Although I can not state on the flavor of these, my bunny "Bugsby" really loves these. He usually eats quite a few of the hoops in one sitting, with no left over crumbs (and he is quite a finicky eater). 🐰 The bag is kinda small in ounces, I do wish more came in the bag, for the price of them. Although when delivered this bag ended up with quite a few of them crushed. This was sad because it is less my bunny can eat and even less value of money per the ounces .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: however they aren't very good for guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: my daughters guinea pig LOVES these treats... she hears the bag open and goes nuts for them!!! however they aren't very good for guinea pigs... or most small furry pets which is why this gets a 3/5 if there was less sugar in them and better quality ingredients it would be a 5/5 however i will continue to buy these on rare occasions for my daughters pet because those popcorns are to dang cute
customer_reviews.author: RAlvarado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Treat for my Bunny
customer_reviews.text: My Lionhead Rabbit loves these treats. I add a few of these into his Timothy hay pile so he can amuse himself by looking for a treat in a haystack! By the afternoon, all of the treats have been found and eaten. My rabbit is a little picky, but loves these treats. I would recommend these treats for any small animals.
customer_reviews.author: Deb613

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS LIKE PLAYDOUGH
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit would not touch these. As soon as I opened them, they smelled strongly like playdough. I wouldn't recommend these for consumption for any living creature. I through them straight into the garbage. What a waste of my hard earned money!!
customer_reviews.author: jacksoc7

customer_reviews.title: My pet rats love Tropical Carnival Hoops.
customer_reviews.text: These treats are my pet rats favorite. If I set a yummy variety of food out for my rats, they want to come get a Tropical Carnival Hoop before eating anything else. I wish these were available in a larger ounce or pound bag.
customer_reviews.author: D. K.

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled little pets
customer_reviews.text: My hamster loves finding these treats hidden in his house. He's fun to watch when he finds a treasure. The guinea pig, not so much, but he's really picky, he doesn't even care for celery.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen O

customer_reviews.title: Just like fruit loops (size etc)
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves these. It’s his favorite. I say “biscuit you want a cookie “ lol and she puts her head at the end of the cage and takes the little loop from my hand. They look just like a fruit loop cereal same size about and all
customer_reviews.author: Crystal O’Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Yummy but Pricey
customer_reviews.text: My bunnies love these. I'm not sure what makes them so expensive, but I keep on buying these as treats for my rabbits, because that's what they like, and who am I to deny my bunnies!
customer_reviews.author: Sugarcane

customer_reviews.title: Chinchillin ain’t easy
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our chinchilla and she loved them. Local pet stores were charging a lot more or have limited stock of these types of items.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Great treats, bag will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: I got these to put in Easter eggs for my 5-year olds to give to their hamsters. It was perfect for that purpose, although the hamsters don't seem to enjoy these treats as much as the eCotrition Bites ( which they run for as soon as I come near the cage with one. They do eat these eventually, but only after they've made it through all their food. I'll find half-eaten rings when cleaning out their cage, which is normal for dwarf hamsters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Treats for rats
customer_reviews.text: My rats seems to like these as one of their once a week treats. They are fairly hard so it good for their dental health
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Hamsters won't touch them
customer_reviews.text: For some reason our hamsters won't get close to these things much less eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Fun for rats!
customer_reviews.text: I hang these from the top of my rats' cage like little pinatas and they go nuts as they puzzle out how to get them down. They love these things. Working for their treats helps with boredom for them and is fun to watch as well, I recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss with my Rats
customer_reviews.text: My rats are not too impressed with these. I tried to get them something they would grind their teeth on since they barely use any chews I buy them. They seem to really dislike the purple ones but are okay with the orange and red. These will still sit in the cage for days before they mess with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna McMaster

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: There must have been something in it that does not taste right. My guineas eat just about anything, but they would not eat this, not even my rat. The cost was higher than treats you can buy at the local pet store. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Luwanna Brown

customer_reviews.title: My bunnies love them!
customer_reviews.text: My rabbits love these treats. I have two bunnies and one will scarf his down and then try to eat whatever falls out of the other bun's mouth because he loves these so much. They do not seem to upset my rabbit's digestion (one of them has a very sensitive stomach).
customer_reviews.author: Clover

customer_reviews.title: Good for rats!
customer_reviews.text: Hi! Our rats like these fairly well. They will take them and usually eat most of them. My only issue with these is that half of them are broken, but they still eat them just fine. Make sure to feed your pets good, quality food and give treats only in a reasonable amount.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Bunz

customer_reviews.title: Rat Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is not very big but my rat LOVES the treats! They shipped quick and were packaged well!
customer_reviews.author: RPlumb

customer_reviews.title: Our rabbit loves this mix
customer_reviews.text: Our Burt loves this mix with his veggies and can't get enough, good thing it's at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Terry L.

customer_reviews.title: Good for rats
customer_reviews.text: My rats love them! Great treats for hiding in puzzles and rewarding for tricks
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: bunny treat
customer_reviews.text: My 2 lop-eared bunnies went crazy for this treat - mixed it with regular timothy grass based hoops. Was definitely a hit with my rabbits.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Muller

customer_reviews.title: fun to
customer_reviews.text: When I give my bunny this treat he takes it in his house it's the only treat he does this with, guess he doesn't want to share even there is no other animal to take it away. fun to watch
customer_reviews.author: Janece  Rioux

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My little bunny loves these! They may not be the healthiest, so she doesn't get them very often. But she is VERY happy when she gets a treat :)
customer_reviews.author: Alixandra Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My rats are picky eaters and will only eat the treats out of the mix. They dig through and eat the bigger items, but not the vitamin rich rings or small seeds. Turns out to be a bit of a waste but that’s probably just them.
customer_reviews.author: Crispygoddess

customer_reviews.title: Bunnies love them
customer_reviews.text: My bunnies LOVE THESE. If I leave out some treats with food, these are the first things they eat. I highly recommend. My sister's rabbits don't enjoy them though so not everyone's pets may like them.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: My chinchillas must be uppity because they didn't eat these.
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas hated this stuff. Couldn't get them to eat it to save my life.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: Pieces are larger and harder than I was expecting. ...
customer_reviews.text: Pieces are larger and harder than I was expecting. I have to break up into 4-6 pcs for my pet. Have 13 ounce, 13-1/2 yr old chinchilla. He can't bite into anything hard or large. Thanks Mickey PS: They were to hard for me to bite into.
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: Hamster loves these
customer_reviews.text: Robo hamster loves this. It is healthy and gives extra vitamins and best of all, it keeps our hamsters teeth healthy. Will be buying this again. Highly recommend this for hamsters.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: he digs them out and eats them first --- kind of like a kid moving the spinach out of the way ...
customer_reviews.text: My Hopscotch loves these. I mix them in with his standard rabbit food so he can get a little taste with each meal. Unfortunately, he digs them out and eats them first --- kind of like a kid moving the spinach out of the way to get to the mac & cheese. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Anne Laird

customer_reviews.title: they like the yogurt ones better but will humor me by ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my rats got tired of it after a few weeks. They would accept it and then put it somewhere and not eat it for days. Now I mix up their treats between this and the yogurt treats from the same brand; they like the yogurt ones better but will humor me by eating these fairly often.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Livesay

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting, potential upset tummy.
customer_reviews.text: My picky bunny loves it tho i do think it gives her some mushy stool. (4 stars) EDIT: I love these treats but now that theyre being sold 2x times price in store i will be buying offline. (3 Stars)
customer_reviews.author: Programmer

customer_reviews.title: My rabbits LOVE these things!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 rabbits. A Holland Lop and a Mini Rex. Neither one is a particularly picky eater, but there are definitely certain treats they prefer more than others. These are one of those treats. Sugary, crunchy, and a nice size - not too big or too small. I feed my rabbits usually one in the morning and one at night, in addition to their pellets and hay.
customer_reviews.author: Erik H.

customer_reviews.title: They're Okay For Rats
customer_reviews.text: These things smell a little funky, but they seem to go over okay with my rats. They will take them from me and eat them, but they're not their favorite treat. I feel like the fruity flavors make them more suited to guinea pigs or rabbits, however.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy M

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this but my Guinea pig won't touch eat. Even if I try hand feeding it to her, she won't try it. So much for a treat :(.
customer_reviews.author: JMBG

customer_reviews.title: Fun snack for my dwarf hamster
customer_reviews.text: Fun snack for my dwarf hamster. i like to give her a change in snacks to keep her interested and she carried these around with her and buried them. Guess that means she likes the smell and taste and is saving for later
customer_reviews.author: KAH

customer_reviews.title: larger than i thought and all broken
customer_reviews.text: These arived almost all broken. And they are quite large. I can wear them as a ring on my pinkie
customer_reviews.author: Allison Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good product, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: These are great little treats, but not my rat's favorite. Product was delivered on time and was exactly what I ordered. I love this brand of treats. I recommend trying them for your pet if you want something new and different.
customer_reviews.author: alwaysOrganizing

customer_reviews.title: Piggies <3 this
customer_reviews.text: our lil piggies love this treat. they whistle at us every day around the same time & we know right away that they want this special lil treat. also this is a great price... $2 cheaper than the pet stores
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. O

customer_reviews.title: ... gliders so Def keeping and ordering again if they like.. it's quick to get to me and ...
customer_reviews.text: My sugar glider is picky but I plan to have more sugar gliders so Def keeping and ordering again if they like..it's quick to get to me and convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Denise:)

customer_reviews.title: My pet rat treats.
customer_reviews.text: My pet rat like them. He is sometimes a fussy eater and I have to try new foods for him.
customer_reviews.author: W. G.

customer_reviews.title: Treats
customer_reviews.text: My bunny can eat the whole bag if you'd let him.
customer_reviews.author: TNReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Robo likes them
customer_reviews.text: I have a robo hamster, Mila, and she seems to really like these! She has a loft house in her cage that she never uses, so I like to put some treats up there for her to sniff out and find. Glad I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Black

customer_reviews.title: Our hamster absolutely loved these things
customer_reviews.text: Our hamster absolutely loved these things!! They don't spell very tropical and I was worried about that at first but, he still loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Neither our chinchilla nor our sugar gliders would touch these ...
customer_reviews.text: Neither our chinchilla nor our sugar gliders would touch these. We tried on multiple occasions to entice them into trying them and they were not even interested. I will end up throwing them.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: NEW
customer_reviews.text: WAS A GIFT FOR STEPDAUGHTER'S GUINEA PIG. HE LOVES THEM
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA

customer_reviews.title: Great for foraging
customer_reviews.text: They smell REALLY strong and that's not a complaint - my rabbit goes nuts if I even open the bag.
customer_reviews.author: jthx

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's pet rat loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because my daughter's pet rat really likes them. There are not many things on the market for pet rats that are really safe for pets, or made of ingredients that my daughter feels are good for her pet, so these fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: JaneP

customer_reviews.title: ... gave this product 1 star because my hamsters don't like it. They're finicky eaters
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 1 star because my hamsters don't like it. They're finicky eaters. Who to say other hamsters won't enjoy it. It's just that all 5 of mine do not.
customer_reviews.author: Sarey Chim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our two rats love these treats! They smell good, and we haven't had any digestion issues.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: but all in all they love
customer_reviews.text: very fruity smell, my rats seem to care which flavor they get, but all in all they love them
customer_reviews.author: nmwhipkey

customer_reviews.title: My chinchilla goes gaga for these treats!
customer_reviews.text: They smell almost as if they're for people, haha. They're solid and easy to chew on them, my chin Gibson gets very excited when I offer these to him, and there's a good amount in the bag. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sadiedragon

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit loves em!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the treats for a rabbit she loves them and hops right over to eat them when we give them to her. We will buy again however wish that they did not use artificial colors (reason for 4 stars).
customer_reviews.author: 4theboyz

customer_reviews.title: Loves his loops!
customer_reviews.text: Bunny favorite. He pushes his other food out of the way to get his loops!
customer_reviews.author: MamaJ

customer_reviews.title: wonderful treat! my rabbits and hamster love it
customer_reviews.text: wonderful treat! my rabbits and hamster love it! they start to bounce around when i just shake the bag~ is easy to chew and it smells really good! my pets just can't resist it!
customer_reviews.author: Embrace55

customer_reviews.title: F M Browns Hoops & Honey
customer_reviews.text: My mice like them a lot. Great product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Headlam

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit addiction
customer_reviews.text: We have a Flemish giant and he is now addicted to these treats! Not sure how good they are for him but it is getting ugly when we run out!
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: Chinchilla seems to like it not as much as the other but its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford

customer_reviews.title: G-Ma With Two Angels
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes our guinea pigs would eat it and sometimes not...not saying it is a bad product, we really do have picky eaters! The price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: GMA5VBARB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit seems to really enjoy these. The shipping was really quick too. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: MARIEL N MEYER

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: An awesome treat for my pigs. They love getting these every so often.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Castleberry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rats love it. Safe and healthy product for them. As well as any small animal. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Staley

customer_reviews.title: Bunny loves them more than me, really.
customer_reviews.text: I like to hide a few of these under a pile of hay for the rabbit. He spends a lot of time "hunting" these in the hay.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pyszczymuka

customer_reviews.title: Nice treat
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice treat for the guinea pigs and they seem to enjoy the crispy texture and flavor. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: TSR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not that there is anything wrong with these but my gerbils and hamster do not eat them
customer_reviews.author: J. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: one of my bunny's favorite treats but my hamsters don't really care for these
customer_reviews.author: Kaybeedoll

customer_reviews.title: Treat worthy of buying
customer_reviews.text: Great treats for once in awhile my rabbit loves them. Will buy again. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to both my guinea pigs and hamsters, they love it so much! All I have to do is shake the bag and they come running!
customer_reviews.author: Tesa

customer_reviews.title: Chinchilla's dont like these
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla hates these. Won't even go near them. In the garage they go.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.C

customer_reviews.title: ... forward to one of these every day for being good! They smell good too
customer_reviews.text: My rats look forward to one of these every day for being good! They smell good too, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett Brzezinski

customer_reviews.title: Hamster doesn't like
customer_reviews.text: The hamster isn't crazy about them, and she likes most things.
customer_reviews.author: April Vandervest

customer_reviews.title: Bunnies like the hoops
customer_reviews.text: I can't say these are my bunnies favorite treats but they do enjoy them. It adds variety to their snack time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately my chinchillas does not want eat those honey strawberry flavored treats.. :( I have a whole bag left with those..
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Y.

customer_reviews.title: Boe & Scrappy love these!!
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas enjoy these as a treat, and I've taught them tricks in order to get one!!
customer_reviews.author: blu3yed.rav3n

customer_reviews.title: not his favorite treat.
customer_reviews.text: Our Syrian hamster likes these "okay" but def. not his favorite treat.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: My hamster Piper II loves these!
customer_reviews.text: She waits for these every day. THe only down side is that she now prefers these treats to her regular health food.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my mothers dwarf hamster loves these little treats. Will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_S

customer_reviews.title: Good Bunny Treats
customer_reviews.text: My bunny originally loved these, not not so much...we will see, maybe he'll change his mind again.
customer_reviews.author: sadielucci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My bunny Marshmallow lives these. He hears the plastic and comes running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my rats seems to love these. He'll eat the entire thing
customer_reviews.text: One of my rats seems to love these. He'll eat the entire thing! But the other one just smells them and walks away. They're great for the price, but not for picky rats.
customer_reviews.author: Candice chapman

customer_reviews.title: Rat will only eat one flavor in this mix
customer_reviews.text: My rat will only eat the purple ones. Will try another treat for training
customer_reviews.author: Waikala

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hamsters will eat them, but they don't come running for them.
customer_reviews.author: Opusquest

customer_reviews.title: hoops
customer_reviews.text: These hoops are a good treat for our little ferret she will take one and run and hide to eat it so you cant take it away from her
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rat LOVES these. He comes running when he hears the bag rustle.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C

customer_reviews.title: Bunny loves
customer_reviews.text: My bunny likes them. I call them his fruit loops.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Webster

customer_reviews.title: Jimmy the Rat thinks they are delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Our rat absolutely loves these! He goes crazy when he hears the bag open.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M

customer_reviews.title: For my Squirrel
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my pet squirrel and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat for bunny
customer_reviews.text: These treats were as expected. My bunny loves them and they smell really good.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Treats for Ratties
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my three pet rats and they love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: FLBRAT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig was not interested in them at all.
customer_reviews.author: kristen s

customer_reviews.title: Absolute yes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this for cleaning my rats' cage. It smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My holland lop loved these! I would definitely get them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baker

customer_reviews.title: shes very picky and it was my first time purchasing fruit hoops so i am glad i did not waste my money
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves these treats. shes very picky and it was my first time purchasing fruit hoops so i am glad i did not waste my money. she eats them up!
customer_reviews.author: Krystin

customer_reviews.title: alright
customer_reviews.text: My rat likes them, but I think there is a lot of air that makes them up so when he takes his first bite they just fall apart versus other treats I can buy that are of the same price or cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rats love this treat. It's like fruit loops for rats!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: 2 Rats love this!
customer_reviews.text: My two pet rats go crazy for these. The second I start shaking the bag they come running to the front of the cage and pushing their faces through the bars. Would recommend for any rat owner!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: The Little Guy Loves His Fruit Loops!
customer_reviews.text: Hamster Bitey (our Guinea pig, named by my little son) loves these. He is adorable when he climbs up and sticks his head out of the open cage door, in anticipation of one. If I had the talent to, I could probably train the little guy with these! Great price for a great treat.
customer_reviews.author: Shelulu

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: my rabbit loves these but I do not love the ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Kate McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking all over for these. My bunnies loves them when they are mixed in their food but I could never find them sold seperately. The reason for 4 stars is think they are a little expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH GRASMAN

customer_reviews.title: My chinchillas don't like them
customer_reviews.text: These treats are different than any other kind that my chinchillas have ever had. All three of them don't care for them and they are always disinterested when I try to give them to them.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Reed

customer_reviews.title: well....
customer_reviews.text: They like them okay ( the pet rats) but they aren't crazy about them so I probably will not buy more unless they change there minds about them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamielee

product_meta.title: F.M. Brown's Tropical Carnival Hoops Small Animal Treats, 3-oz Bag - Vitamins and Minerals for Rabbits, Guinea Pigs, Chinchillas, Mice, Rats and Hamsters, Supports Healthy Teeth and Gums
product_meta.description: Brown’s Tropical Carnival Hoops with Honey Treats are nutritious, fun-to-eat, crispy-puffy foraging snacks with natural honey and berry flavor in every crunchy bite. The unique, round shapes have a porous texture that satisfies your small animal’s natural gnawing instinct.
feature_bullets: Relieve Cage Boredom: Stimulate The Natural Foraging Instinct To Keep Your Pets Energized And Happy
Support Healthy Teeth And Gums: The Porous Texture And Round Shape Are Perfect For Tooth And Gum Support
Vitamin-Nutrient-Fortified: Fortifited With Vitamins, Minerals To Create A Healthy Treat For Your Pets
Support Good Digestion: Probiotics Help Stimulate Good Digestion So Your Pet Can Get The Most Out Of Our Nutrient-Rich Ingredients
Usa Produced And Packaged: Feel Good Knowing You Are Feeding Your Pet Locally Produced Food
